description: Did the EEG-Channels were digitized before or after the individual digitization points?
Two EEG-Channels to make a bipolar-channel
The size of the window (for each side) for the rolling-difference
The minimal distance for events to be recognized by Peak-Detection
The maximum distance for to be seen as joint (Up/Down)
The range around the diff (for each side) to look for the best regression-range
The n-th degree polynomial to fit with linear Regression
Length of the baseline spanning from min_ev_distance before the rd-peak
The distance from the middle of the slope to the beginning of the baseline (avoid having the slope inside the baseline)
